resources.string: Check out the resources to continue improving!

array.name: questionnaire
array.item: I am happy
My family makes me happy
My friends make me happy
My career makes me happy
I am pleased with the way I am
I am pleased with my approach to life
I am rarely interested in other people
I feel tired/low energy
I have feelings of guilt
I I feel like a failure
I have difficulty making decisions
I have little interest in doing things
I feel hopeless
I sleep too much
I don't sleep enough
I am working toward a long term goal
I have good memory

array.name: recs_now
array.item: Write down 3+ good qualities about yourself
Request from friends, family or loved ones to send you a list of 3+ things they appreciate about you
Look for an exciting event and write it in your calendar

array.name: recs_daily
array.item: Write down one thing you're grateful for
Write down one good thing that happened today
Wear clothes that make you feel good
Eat a good meal
Choose one activity and focus on only that for 30 minutes
Limit your social media usage by 30 minutes
Go on a ten minute walk
Remoe all electronics before going to sleep

array.name: recs_weekly
array.item: Yoga class
Dancing class
Cycling class
Meditate
